properties.name: spring.method-activity.security-context-enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable security context, authentication expression variable. Default is false. Enable this only if you have spring-boot-starter-security enabled.

properties.name: spring.method-activity.default-variables.authentication-variable
properties.description: Name of the variable to store authentication object in expression. Default is 'authentication'.

properties.name: spring.method-activity.default-variables.simple-class-name-variable
properties.description: Name of the variable to store simple class name string in expression. Default is 'simpleClassName'.

properties.name: spring.method-activity.default-variables.full-class-name-variable
properties.description: Name of the variable to store full class name string in expression. Default is 'fullClassName'.

properties.name: spring.method-activity.default-variables.method-name-variable
properties.description: Name of the variable to store method name string in expression. Default is 'methodName'.

properties.name: spring.method-activity.default-variables.package-name-variable
properties.description: Name of the variable to store package name string in expression. Default is 'packageName'.

properties.name: spring.method-activity.default-variables.return-object-variable
properties.description: Name of the variable to store return object in expression. Default is 'returnObject'.

properties.name: spring.method-activity.default-variables.execution-time-variable
properties.description: Name of the variable to store execution time in expression. Default is 'executionTime'.

properties.name: spring.method-activity.default-variables.exception-variable
properties.description: Name of the variable to store the exception in expression. Default is 'exception'.
